text: "Heaven in Your Eyes" is a 1986 song by Canadian rock band Loverboy for the soundtrack to the 1986 movie Top Gun. It later appeared on their 1989 greatest hits album Big Ones. It went to number 24 in Canada and number 12 in the United States. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Soft rock songs Category:Loverboy songs
title: Heaven in Your Eyes
